SiCheng Jiang

B.Eng. Student
Beijing Institute of Technology
Sicheng-7219@outlook.com


Short Bio

I’m a Bachelor of Engineering (B.Eng.) student at Beijing Institute of Technology (BIT), where I have had the privilege of receiving an outstanding foundational education in automation and modern control theory. My academic achievements include an impressive GPA of 3.8, ranking 5th out of 196 fellow students, and earning numerous awards in competitions, as well as multiple scholarships and honours.

I’m currently working on my graduation thesis, doing research on robot control and multi-agent decision-making based on the Robot Operating System (ROS). Additionally, my research interests extend to localization, complex systems, and optimization. Being scheduled to graduate from BIT in June 2024, I’m actively seeking opportunities to pursue an MPhil or MRes program and I’m ready to participate in a research project starting in July 2024.

Articles

  1. A Individual Time Trial Strategy Model Based on Improved OmTTE and SCPO Model
    Sicheng Jiang, Zimo Wang, Meitong Li
    Finalist in Mathematical Contest in Modeling 2021
    PDF Supporting Files
  2. UAV passive positioning formation control based on simulated annealing wolf packs model
    Sicheng Jiang, Zimo Wang, Meitong Li
    Seconed Prize in Beijing Division of the Contemporary Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling 2022
    PDF(zh-cn) Supporting Files
  3. Evaluation model of defect degree of wire rope based on magnetic balance principle and wavelet analysis processing method
    Sicheng Jiang, Zimo Wang, Meitong Li
    Winners in Hua Zhong Bei Mathematical Contest in Modeling 2022
    PDF(zh-cn) Supporting Files

The articles above were written during my participation in the Mathematical Contest in Modeling. In three competitions, I served as the leader for a group of three, responsible for modeling and paper writing. Through this experience, I developed the ability to analyse academic problems in group work, scan previous research, and use basic coding approaches to experiment.

Design of intelligent waste sorting system based on machine learning method
